name: Dracula's Tower: Blood Bath
description:
This is "Dracula's Tower: Blood Bath", a game made for the Mini Jam 118: Vampires by me & Michael Svoboda. The limitation of this jam was "Blood is Lethal". Hence, you will find blood to be fatal hahah. Enjoy the game! 

A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow to move the player. Space to jump. Best of luck knight.

ps - If the browser version of the game is not working for you, download the PC version <3 

.

.

.
Attributions;

  • Music by SOUND AIRYLUVS by ISAo https://airyluvs.com/
  • Gothic Window Tileset by Max Johnson
  • Hit sound effect by http://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/98341/ by CGEffex
  • End Music by Zefz
  • Button art by StumpyStrust
  • Dungeon Font by vrtxrry
  • Bloodsplash animation by overcrafted
  • Background Mountains Art by Ansimuz
  • Vampire Sprite also by Ansimuz
  • UI Box by Kindland
  • Main Character by Szadi art
  • Vampire Scream Sound by Rupert_Spore

GitHub Link to Project: https://github.com/mars16-exe/Vampire---Blood-is-Lethal-2D
